simulator

Interface InterruptHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Kernel

    public interface InterruptHandler
    Interface for a kernel that handles interrupts such as timeouts and completion of device I/O operations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int TIME_OUT
      Identifies a time_out interrupt.
      static int WAKE_UP
      Identifies completion of a device I/O request.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void interrupt(int interruptType, java.lang.Object... varargs)
      Invoke the interrupt handler, providing the interrupt type and zero or more arguments.

    • Field Detail

      • TIME_OUT

        static final int TIME_OUT
        Identifies a time_out interrupt. The PID of the affected process is provided as a parameter - generally, it should correspond to that of the process currently executing!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WAKE_UP

        static final int WAKE_UP
        Identifies completion of a device I/O request. Device ID and Process ID are required parameters.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • interrupt

        void interrupt(int interruptType,
               java.lang.Object... varargs)
        Invoke the interrupt handler, providing the interrupt type and zero or more arguments.
